summary: This bill, S.24, designates the U.S. Postal Service facility located at 154 First Avenue East in Jerome, Idaho, as the “Representative Maxine Bell Post Office”. The bill was introduced by Senators Crapo and Risch on January 7, 2025, and was referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. The bill's provisions state that any references to the facility should be updated accordingly.
